metadata.dc:author: Peña Porta, J M
Pernaute Lavilla, R
metadata.dc:description: We report a new case of Wunderlich's syndrome (spontaneous perirenal hematoma) in a patient with chronic renal failure undergoing hemodialysis secondary to acquired renal cystic disease. The literature relative to this condition is review.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Wunderlich en paciente en hemodiálisis con enfermedad quística renal adquirida. Aportación de un nuevo caso.
[Wunderlich's syndrome in a patient on hemodialysis with acquired cystic kidney disease. A report of a new case].
